data.tweet: Arsenal created more than Aston Villa, finding chances worth 2.7 expected goals to Aston Villa's 0.2. Arsenal did well to limit Villa, who have averaged 0.9 xG per 90 minutes this season. Premier League teams have averaged 1.3 xG per match.
sentences: Arsenal managed to create an impressive 2.7 xG worth of chances.
Aston Villa managed to create an impressive 0.2 xG worth of chances.
This season, Aston Villa have averaged 0.9 expected goals per 90 minutes.
Premier league teams have averaged 1.3 expected goals per 90 minutes.

data.tweet: Arsenal took eight shots on target, considerably more than the Premier League average of 4.0 per 90 minutes.
sentences: Arsenal took eight shots on target.
Premier league teams have averaged 4.0 shots on target per 90 minutes.

data.tweet: Aston Villa only managed three key passes, compared with 15 from Arsenal. This season Aston Villa have averaged 7.6 key passes per 90 minutes. Arsenal also succesfully played 15 balls into the opponent's box, while Aston Villa managed four
sentences: Arsenal completed 15 key passes.
Aston Villa completed three key passes.
This season, Aston Villa have averaged 7.6 key passes per 90 minutes.
Arsenal managed to play an impressive 15 successful balls into the opponent's box.
Aston Villa managed to play an impressive four successful balls into the opponent's box.

data.tweet: Aston Villa applied less pressure high up the pitch than in previous games. In this match, they pressed 12 times in the final third, but throughout the season they've averaged 25.0 final third presses per 90 minutes.
sentences: Aston Villa pressed their opponent 12 times in the final third.
This season, Aston Villa have pressed their opponent in the final third an average of 25.0 times per 90 minutes.

data.tweet: Arsenal made 14 interceptions, while Aston Villa made seven. Arsenal also made 19 clearances in this match, considerably more than the eight they made in their last match (against Fulham).
sentences: Arsenal made 14 interceptions.
Aston Villa made seven interceptions.
Arsenal made 19 clearances.
In their last game (against Fulham) Arsenal made eight clearances.

data.tweet: Goal scorer Martinelli was our man of the match.
sentences: Martinelli was our man of the match.
Martinelli scored one goal.

data.tweet: Martinelli created some of the best chances of the game - tallying an xA of 0.4 (joint most of anyone on the pitch, alongside Ben White).
sentences: Martinelli managed to create an impressive 0.4 xG worth of chances.
Ben White created more expected goals than any other player on the pitch.
Ben White managed to create an impressive 0.4 xG worth of chances.
Martinelli created more expected goals than any other player on the pitch.

sentences: Martinelli successfully recieved 12 progressive passes.
Martinelli successfully recieved more progressive passes than any other player on the pitch.
